name: Ney Adventures
description:
Ney Adventures and a platform game designed for the Game Boy JAM 5 (#gbjam).

A being from another dimension and forced to go through insane test areas to check the limits of their capacity. Contact with the nitrogen from the atmosphere and lethal to him forcing to look for your mask recarregas the only equipment that keeps him alive.

This game is in the initial development phase and will undergo several changes and improvements over the coming weeks. If you want to contribute to the project by donating any amount to I will be very cat and I can increasingly focus on improving the project.

Current version: Alpha 0.1.

Commands:

Jump: Spacebar;

Horizontal movement: arrows to the right and left;

Vertical movement: arrows down and up;

Credits:

  • Saulo Daniel Ferreira Pontes – Programming and Game Design.
  • Vítor Silva Soares – Music and SFX.
